original_title: Bindi Irwin’s surgery and Valley fever spike, plus fat-burning treadmill trend | Fox News
article_summary: This week's Fox News Health newsletter highlights a surge in Valley fever cases, Bindi Irwin's medical journey, and a fat-burning treadmill trend. Additionally, experts suggest cutting out alcohol and medicating sooner to prevent a "silent killer," and a major medical group recommends COVID shots for young kids despite CDC guidelines.</s>
